Banner.Description: A results-driven software engineer with 3 years of experience crafting high-performance, scalable web and mobile applications. Skilled in Angular, React, React Native, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, I bring designs to life with clean, efficient code and a deep focus on seamless user experiences. Passionate about modern front-end technologies, I constantly explore new techniques to push the limits of what's possible on the web.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I love building web and mobile applications that are not just functional but also smooth, scalable, and visually engaging. With 3 years of experience in front-end development, Iâ€™ve worked extensively with React, React Native, and Angular to create fast, responsive, and intuitive user interfaces. I enjoy writing clean, reusable code and optimizing performance to deliver seamless experiences across devices.
Beyond front-end development, I have hands-on experience with user authentication (SSO, JWT), payment gateway integration, multi-language support, and real-time data handling.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer L2
Description: Developed and maintained scalable web applications, including an insurance portal, an incident management system, and a movie ticket booking platform.
Optimized code efficiency by 40% for over 20 customers, enhancing application performance and user experience.
Transformed Figma designs into fully responsive, user-friendly interfaces using Angular, React, and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated RESTful APIs for seamless data communication and implemented authentication (SSO, JWT) for secure access control.
Built an advanced incident management system from scratch, using Angular, NGRX for state management, and Chart.js for real-time data visualization.
Developed key features for a movie ticket booking platform, including user authentication, seat selection, multi-language support, and payment processing.
Conducted training sessions on Angular and React, helping team members upskill and boosting productivity.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Reel Cinemas
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Contributed to the redevelopment of a movie ticket booking platform, transitioning the application from .NET to React for improved scalability and modernized user experience. Developed a responsive and accessible front-end with a focus on reusable components and a modular architecture. Implemented essential features like user authentication, seat selection, ticket booking, offers, multi-language support and food ordering options, ensuring a seamless and engaging user journey. Integrated secure payment options and optimized state management with Redux for a smooth application flow.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agent Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a comprehensive web application for a leading Indian insurance company, featuring over 10 insurance products.The portal streamlines policy issuance, renewals, endorsements, and claims management. Integrated CRM tools for managing client interactions and leads. Led the project through design, development, testing, and deployment ensuring a responsive and user-friendly experience with key functionalities like API integration and authentication.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Incident Management System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Designed and developed a robust Incident Management System to streamline real-time incident tracking, escalation, and resolution. The system features on-call scheduling, automated escalation policies, and real-time monitoring to ensure quick responses to critical events. Integrated Azure AD SSO for secure authentication and implemented interactive dashboards with Chart.js for data-driven insights. Built with a modular architecture for scalability and maintainability, enhancing operational efficiency.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Harshit's Superstore
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed Harshit's Superstore, a comprehensive e-commerce platform designed to enhance online shopping experiences. The platform features dynamic product listing, a product detail view, and a real-time cart system, allowing users to seamlessly add or remove items. Integrated search, sorting, and filtering features to streamline navigation and improve user experience. Managed application state with Reducers and Contexts, ensuring efficient data handling and smooth performance.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Favourite Places
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed Favourite Places, a mobile app allowing users to save their favorite places with location tagging and images. Leveraged native device features such as location access and camera functionality, enhancing user interaction. Integrated smooth navigation between screens and ensured efficient data storage using SQLite.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: My Recipe Book
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created an app displaying various cuisines, each containing a list of recipes with details on ingredients. Users can add or remove recipes from their favorites, utilizing a combination of Native Stack Navigator and Drawer Navigator for seamless navigation.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Translate App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Built a text translation app using React, enabling real-time language detection and translation through a third-party API with a clean, user-friendly interface.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Expense Tracker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created an Expense Tracker app that enables users to add, remove, edit, and fetch expenses, providing insights into their spending. It utilizes an external API built with Firebase for real-time data synchronization.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Guess My Number
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a simple game called 'Guess My Number' where players input a number, and the app attempts to guess it. Players indicate whether their number is lower or higher than the guessed number, and once the correct guess is made, a game-over screen displays the winning number.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
